pluginstrument.author: Simstrumentation
pluginstrument.description:
Cessna 414 (FlySimWare) Fuel Selector Valves
Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION "EXTERMINATE THE MICE FROM YOUR COCKPIT!" GitHub: https://github.com/simstrumentation
Fuel selector valves for the FlySimWare C414 Chancellor
INSTRUCTIONS Tap / click on the labels for the fuel selector positions to select that position
V1.0 - Released 2022-06-21
NOTE: Will only work with FlySimWare C414 Chancellor
KNOWN ISSUES: - None
